duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests, provide outstanding customer service, and settle guest accounts.
Handle room reservations, telephone switchboard, and information requests efficiently.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and hotel operation compliance.
Handle check-ins, check-outs, and room reservations in a friendly and courteous manner.
Operate the Front Desk computer system and ensure delivery of guest items as needed.
Participate in creating an enjoyable work environment and maintaining property amenities knowledge.
Assist in emergency procedures and maintaining cleanliness and safety throughout the hotel.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required; College course work in related field helpful
